title: Document Comparison Analysis for Evaluating and Improving Curriculum Redundancy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Curriculum Design and Language Education Programs
context.additional_context: Conducted asynchronously via an online LMS, emphasizing collaboration and document analysis using digital devices. Requires efficient feedback systems scaled to learner capacity

learning_goals: Learners can systematically compare curriculum documents (syllabi, pedagogical methods, assessment approaches) to identify redundant elements.
Learners can specify curriculum improvement plans based on redundancy analysis results.
Learners can analyze real-world language curriculum cases and write reports through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
